title: Psychic Game
description: A guessing game where the user must guess what letter the computer is thinking of!

title: Code Quiz
description: A timed, multiple choice quiz to test your coding knowledge. Give it a shot!

title: Workday Planner
description: A daily planner application to help you schedule your work day! Save your events to keep track.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A web application where you can search for a city and retrieve current/future conditions.

title: Netflix and Chilies
description: A web application to search meal delivery options and streaming movies to accompany them.

title: Team Profile Generator
description: A Node CLI app to build a team profile HTML file based on user input of employee information.

title: Note Taker
description: An Express.js application that lets the user write, save, and delete notes.

title: Beyond Vacation
description: A full-stack application for posting and reserving rentals for outdoor vacations!
